Author: SHossain#0007
Content:
we can stop iguana, edit the `dpowassets` with the following line and start iguana again
```
curl --url "http://127.0.0.1:7776" --data "{\"agent\":\"iguana\",\"method\":\"dpow\",\"symbol\":\"KMDICE\",\"freq\":2,\"pubkey\":\"$pubkey\"}"
```
